posts.title: PS42
posts.description:
Moving away from the more complex Cell microarchitecture of its predecessor, the console features an AMD Accelerated Processing Unit (APU) built upon the x86-64 architecture, which can theoretically peak at 1.84 teraflops; AMD stated that it was the "most powerful" APU it had developed to date. The PlayStation 4 places an increased emphasis on social interaction and integration with other devices and services, including the ability to play games off-console on PlayStation Vita and other supported devices ("Remote Play"), the ability to stream gameplay online or to friends, with them controlling gameplay remotely ("Share Play"). The console's controller was also redesigned and improved over the PlayStation 3, with improved buttons and analog sticks, and an integrated touchpad among other changes. The console also supports HDR10 High-dynamic-range video and playback of 4K resolution multimedia.

The PlayStation 4 was released to acclaim, with critics praising Sony for acknowledging its consumers' needs, embrace of independent game development, and for not imposing the restrictive digital rights management schemes that Microsoft had previously announced for Xbox One prior to its release. Critics and third-party studios also praised the capabilities of the PlayStation 4 in comparison to its competitors; developers described the performance difference between the console and Xbox One as being "significant" and "obvious".[11] Heightened demand also helped Sony top global console sales. By the end of June 2018, over 82 million PlayStation 4 consoles had been shipped worldwide, nearly surpassing lifetime sales of its predecessor, the PlayStation 3.[12]

On September 7, 2016, Sony unveiled the PlayStation 4 Pro, a high-end version of the console with an upgraded GPU and higher CPU clock rate to support enhanced performance and 4K resolution on supported titles. The company also released a variant of the original model with a smaller form factor, and the release of a patch to add HDR support to all existing consoles.

posts.title: PS4
posts.description:
ОТЛИЧНОЕ помещение под ВАШ БИЗНЕС от 22 кв.м до 227 кв.м
Компания «Строй Сити» предлагает помещения в разных районах города Харькова.
Бизнес, которого не хватает жителям СЕВЕРНОЙ САЛТОВКИ:
• аптека
• салон красоты
• магазин
• развлекательный центр
• ресторан
• автосалон
• банк
• частная школа или детский сад
• стоматологическая клиника
• спорт зал
• барбершоп
• банк
Помещение под ВАШ БИЗНЕС от 22 кв.м до 406 кв.м. 
МЫ ПРЕДЛАГАЕМ:
- помещения на первом этаже жилого комплекса «Венский Дом»
- площадь от 22 кв.м. до 227 кв.м.
- витринные окна
- высота потолков – 3.5 м.
- гостевая парковка
- удобный подъезд

Наши помещения находятся в центре развитого и обжитого района города Харькова
•	Район МЖК «Интернационалист»
•	Огромные окна
•	Свободная планировка
•	Паркинг
